Argushiigi

Argushiigi is an ontology, data resources and linked open data server for the Traveller 5 or T5 role playing game.

Argushiigi is several things:

  • An OWL ontology describing Traveller5
  • Data about the Traveller5 universe and Third Imperium in RDF
  • A web server that formats and serves the data and ontology in various formats

For more information about Traveller and Argushiigi see the FAQ.
